item.title: Northeast Monsoon Season Oceanographic Insitu Data Collection
item.description: On 3rd March, 2020, a team of researcher led by Prof. Nthahondi Nyandwi started a three day oceanographic data gathering in the Pemba Channel. The team launched an ADCP equipment from Kigombe, to measure ocean current’s speed and direction. Figure 1: Ocean current measured from ADCP
